member.name: DML_CUMULATIVE_SUMMATION_OPERATOR_DESC
member.summary: Sums the elements of a tensor along an axis, writing the running tally of the summation into the output tensor.

member.name: DML_CUMULATIVE_SUMMATION_OPERATOR_DESC.InputTensor
member.summary: The input tensor containing elements to be summed.

member.name: DML_CUMULATIVE_SUMMATION_OPERATOR_DESC.OutputTensor
member.summary: The output tensor to write the resulting cumulative summations to. This tensor must have the same sizes and data type as the InputTensor.

member.name: DML_CUMULATIVE_SUMMATION_OPERATOR_DESC.Axis
member.summary: The index of the dimension to sum elements over. This value must be less than the DimensionCount of the InputTensor.

member.name: DML_CUMULATIVE_SUMMATION_OPERATOR_DESC.AxisDirection
member.summary: One of the values of the enumeration. If set to DML_AXIS_DIRECTION_INCREASING, then the summation occurs by traversing the tensor along the specified axis by ascending element index. If set to DML_AXIS_DIRECTION_DECREASING, the reverse is true, and the summation occurs by traversing elements by descending index.

member.name: DML_CUMULATIVE_SUMMATION_OPERATOR_DESC.HasExclusiveSum
member.summary: If TRUE, then the value of the current element is excluded when writing the running tally to the output tensor. If FALSE, then the value of the current element is included in the running tally.
